tool_description: Tradier is a brokerage platform for equity and options trading. It is designed to provide simple, intuitive, and inexpensive ways for users to place trades, check their balances, and transfer money. Tradier provides a RESTful API for accessing the platform's trading functions, account services, and real-time and historical market data.
name: Tradier
title: Tradier

api_list.name: Get option expirations
Get a user's cost basis
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tradier.p.rapidapi.com/user/costbasis"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tradier.p.rapidapi.com/user/costbasis"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get an account's balances

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradier.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradier.p.rapidapi.com"

required_parameters.name: interval
required_parameters.description: One of daily, weekly or monthly

required_parameters.name: symbols
required_parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of equity or option symbols
